article_title: Deloitte challenges IBM CMS award -- Washington Technology
article_text: In an exclusive for WT Insider members, we are collecting all of the contract awards we cover into a database that you can sort by contractor, agency, value and other parameters. You can also download it into a spreadsheet. Our databases track awards back to 2013. Read More

article_metadata.keywords: IBM, Deloitte, Centers for Medicaid and Medicare, CMS, bid protest, Unified Case Management, UCM contract

og.description: Deloitte Consulting is protesting a $36.2 million award to IBM for a CMS systems integration contract that gives prime access to some of CMS's most important fraud and abuse databases.
og.title: Deloitte challenges IBM CMS award -- Washington Technology

article_metadata.description: Deloitte Consulting is protesting a $36.2 million award to IBM for a CMS systems integration contract that gives prime access to some of CMS's most important fraud and abuse databases.

article_summary:
Our databases track awards back to 2013.
In an exclusive for WT Insider members, we are collecting all of the contract awards we cover into a database that you can sort by contractor, agency, value and other parameters.
You can also download it into a spreadsheet.
